text: @StateDept @SecPompeo Thank you State Dept.  China has deliberately covered up its outbreak and forged its coronavirus data in order to spread Wuhan-style lockdowns around the world—crushing human rights, crippling rival economies, and expanding its global surveillance state. #ChinaMustExplain #CHEXIT https://t.co/80HMYCqYi0
